text:
April 26, I960
Dr. Mar ah all McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5, Ontario, Canada
Dear Dr. McLuhan:
Thank you for your letter of April 20 to Mr* Hill.
Due to the usual chaos prevailing the week before the IERT, Mr. Hill
has turned your letter over to m for answering.
Educational grants in America are not tax-exempt.
Very warm regards to you from all of us here.
Sincerely,
RS*jl
(Mrs.) Rose Schmidt
Staff Associate
